content.detailedDescription: At almost exactly 12:10am july 10, we were driving up highway 97 in kelowna to black mountain. my brother and i seen a disc shaped ufo that i first briefly thought was a shooting star. it was moving at least 5x the speed of an airplane and when we glanced at the ufo, it sped off even faster and disappeared into the dark clouds. i knew it wasn't a shooting star because shooting stars bounce off our atmosphere and this was beneath the clouds, also its speed increased to that of a shooting star quickly but gradually.
content.summary: My brother and i were driving and seen it quickly move overhead and then sped up even quicker and disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was standing on a sidewalk walking home from the fourth of july fireworks which had ended 10-15minutes before the sighting. i do not believe in ufos but i do believe we are not alone in the universe, i like to think of myself as rational. 

2- 4. i was walking in a house when i heard someone scream "look at the light in the sky!" so i ran outside and i looked up facing south and i saw this orb of what looked like fire... and it was going very slowly and right when it got just passed the town it sped up so fast it had to have traveled 50miles.

it didn't look like any metal object or human structure no a missle or jet/plane of any sort it was a pure orb looking thing that appeared to be on fire. 

5. my reactions were "what is that? is it a meteor?" "meteors don't stop slow down then speed up when it wants to."

6. i lost the object after it traveled north out of view.

i did not record any of this on any media devices, it was more of a spur of the moment and i was not the only one to witness the object.
content.summary: Orb, flying, stationary, flame, fire, fast, hovering, speeding, vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
I watched my first ufo from the town of boulogne-billancourt where i live, saturday, 06/14/2014 between 1:10 et 1:20 am.
i observed at all between 12 and 15 ufos, all illuminated by a very bright light permanently and artificial orange color and flying in series of 2 or 3 ufos with 3 or 4 separate series. the entire event during 10/12 mn.

i watched the sky and the stars in the western direction from the balcony of my apartment when i saw the first orange light in the sky disappear (there was no moon in the sky that day and sky was clear but with a bit of moisture in the air). this light has appeared strange to me because it was not blinking, it had a yellow-orange color and there was no noise given the speed at which it was moving. this caught my attention. the light disappeared up in the air and speeding.
i then scanned with a great attention the popular night sky in search of other ufos. about 30 seconds later i saw 3 small orange dots appear that came from very far on my right (north) hovering about 8-10 miles away and between 500 m and 900 m in height. they came from the direction of north hovering almost vertically over "la defense" then these points of light grew larger and became brilliant light orange color, quite similar to those i had seen previously, when it came over the "suresnes" city. the orange lights are then directed to st. cloud city and then to the park of st. cloud and the forest of versailles. they went into the southbound then they accelerated soaring into the sky (40 ��) to the southwest (above the parc de st-cloud). 3 lights flying together in formation and at the same speed. i have observed that these lights were not connected by the same structure, they are completely independent of each other. speed ​​constant at first but seemed much faster than a plane or a helicopter (approximately 3 times the speed) and their speed is accelerated (between 6 and 8 times the normal speed of a plane before disappearing quickly) what makes me say that these are ufos. the training was then separated and the ufo took slightly different directions from each other by speeding up and disappeared in 2/3 seconds in the atmosphere.
after the passage of the first ufo, then i woke up my wife to be also witnessed the event.
three other sets of 2/3 ufo were then reproduced with a similar scenario.
i detected no noise, no breath, no reaction. no flickering, flashing lights, trail of condensation of water vapor (contrail) or otherwise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 12-15 ufos near paris (boulogne-billancourt) 06/14/2014

content.detailedDescription: I was enjoying the nite air when i looked to the west and notice a bright light,sat and watched for a while then the lights turned off after a minute or two saw the lights back.They blinked off and on for a few more times than stayed off after the fourth blink.It happened altoghter about two hours.North west of me is the town of dulce about 60 miles
content.summary: Outside enjoying the nite and notice a light that go on and off every so often to the west of my house than disapered

content.detailedDescription:
On june 3rd, at 4am,subject was walking home from walmart in anaheim, and noticed a bright white light in the sky, with a star like center. it just hovered, made no noise and did not move at all.  subject said the light seemed to have a halo around it. subject tried to hear something from it, but it made no noise.  subject said it was big, like "mother ship big". larger than a large airplane.
subject didn't feel well so he walked home.  
subject was not ill due to sighting.
subject tried to take a picture of it, but it didn't show up, so he later drew what he saw on paper
content.summary: Subject left anaheim walmart at 4am and noticed a bright white light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday, july 8, 2014 at about 9:15 pm pacific time.  torrance, ca looking west toward the redondo beach coastline.   there was a marine layer several hundred feet high and appeared to be off the coast.

i stepped out of my house to make sure the cars were locked and noticed a bright red-orange light rising from the horizon.   looking in this direction you can often see aircraft departing from los angeles international airport.  i am a pilot so when i saw the odd and very bright light i looked to see if there were any of the flashing position lights normally seen on aircraft.  there were none.  

as the light rose to what i estimate to be about 1,000 feet i noticed two additional red-orange lights rising from the horizon.  i refer to these as lights 2 and 3.

recognizing this was unusual i called by two adult sons to come witness what i was seeing.  

light #1 dimmed to a faint white light and stopped in the sky at about 2,000 feet.  the other two rose together then separated their formation.  light # 2 appeared to track out to sea in the direction of the northern end of catalina island.  both dimmed like the first one but could still bee seen.  light 3 continued to rise and stop at roughly the same altitude as light 1.   this pattern continued with four to six more lights.  some of the lights moved in a straight path.  some changed directions and stopped in one place at times before continuing to move.

i continued watching light #1, as it approached us.  as it got closer it appeared translucent and white.  it was wobbling and the closest thing i can describe it resembling is a modern parachute.  however, this was no parachute!  it passed us to the south and we lost it as it went behind some trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Approximately 8 red-orange very brights lights rising off redondo beach coast

content.detailedDescription: It was morning about 6 am i was sitting on the back seat of my car with my dad who was driving. we are returning from a late night party and i was observing the sunrise from the car's window (backside) being very clear i don't see that thing because all of my focus is on sunrise but when i decide to take picture of that sunrise i open my phone's camera and when i saw that window again i was shocked because i saw two moving object which was moving too fast opposite to me ,without wasting time i clicked that picture and when i saw from that window again both of the objects were disappeared in clouds as it was really in a very fast speed and also it was moving opposite to me that is my personal experience about that ufo which only i saw because my dad was driving the car and i am alone on the back seat.When i saw mufon's show on history t.V. i thought that it is the right time to share my experience to the world but i want to remain anonymous so it is a kind request to mufon that please hide my identity from this story.
content.summary: When i m observing the sunrise when i click the picture of sunrise i saw two objects moving opposite to me

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i who live in buffalo, ny drove out to north tonawanda on july 4th to stroll around the gateway harbor and view the fireworks. 
while we were waiting on the bridge for the fireworks to begin there were a
number of individual fireworks being set off by various people.   
as we watched the sky we noticed a fleet of red objects coming from two separate areas. one in particular turned very black against the evening sky, hovered for almost a minute and then vanished in front of our eyes. all of the others were rose/red and glowing. they seemed to have a slight aura as they passed overhead. one stream of objects were coming from the north and the other were coming from the southwest. although they were coming from different directions they were going towards the southeast. they passed over us before and during the firework display. two of them stopped and remained stationary still glowing and with a fiery red center and black outer circle as we stood on the bridge underneath looking up. it was almost as if they were watching the fireworks. 
i estimate there were 150-200 people watching the fireworks and many of them saw the objects.
we have no explanation for them, they were silent, and there were planes in the air that must have seen them. they entered from the horizon one after another. their spacing was equidistant and their travel uniform. it was quite alarming, and as they streamed across the sky to the south east from both directions they formed one synchronized line and disappeared out of sight. i estimate i saw about fifteen of these objects. there very well could have been more.
content.summary: Sighting of a large number of red circles in the sky over north tonawanda on the evening of july 4th, 2014.

content.detailedDescription: I opened the side door to enter the garden and instantly noticed what i first thought was a plane with the sun glinting off of it. it was moving from north west to the east. i then noticed it wasn't flying nose straight on, instead drifting at an angle... the more i looked at it the less it appeared as a plane and at one point appeared transparent. it was glittering brightly, from the sun or not is unclear. once my eyes adjusted to what i was seeing it resembled a shard of glass. it moved very quickly, like a jet fighters pace. i watched it fly right over and eventually lost sight of it to the east in clouds. the sky was very clear apart from the odd white cloud. i heard no noise that would usually be expected from an aircraft fly over and i'm constantly viewing planes through my binoculars from the garden. i'm convinced that it was not a plane. other than that i cannot say. this is the second "sighting" i have had from my garden. much like last time i didnt want to attempt to get out my phone or run for my bino's as it was clear that this thing would be gone as soon as i took my eye off it.
content.summary: Glass shard like, sparkling, flying object. daylight sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my truck at approximately 5:48am est on july 7th. the sky was very clear and as i walk to the truck in the mornings i always kinda look up just to see if i see any airplanes or satellites that might be overhead. on this particular morning, just as i was about to get into my truck, i noticed one starlike light coming out of the southeast at a fairly high rate of speed. i figured it to be a satellite so i stopped to wath it fly by. but to my surprise..As i was watching it approach...I noticed a second starlike light on the same flight path, approaching directly from behind of the first light. i thought this was very strange, as i had never saw 2 satellites at the same time on the same flight path. just then i noticed a third starlike light flying at approximately a 45 degree angle off the right side of the second starlike light. well at that time all i could figure out was that it must be 3 jets flying overhead. but just as i decided thats what it was...The first starlike like comes to a sudden and complete stop!! i was like...What the hell?? well i looked back to the 2nd and 3rd starlike lights and they were still approaching. so i watched them until they managed to get very close to the first starlike light and then they both came to a sudden and complete stop!! i was totally shocked!! there was no sound...No change of color..They just sat there. i stood for approximately 5 minutes just staring at them, waiting for them to move. they just sat there in somewhat of a triangle shaped pattern. i finally had to get in my truck to leave so not to be late to catch my ride to work. when i left they were still just sitting there. i dont know what it was i was looking at...But i sure would like some help trying to figure it out!!
content.summary: Witnessed 3 small star like white lights moving in a straight line path at a fairly fast rate of speed and then all three came to a sudden and complete stop.

content.detailedDescription:
..About 9:30p.M, my wife and i were on our way home, about a block before our house, a man flagged us down frantically waving his arms and pointing to an object in the sky. he was walking his dog who was barking wildly at the object and jumping high into the air. it had approached from the n.E. as we watched it cross directly overhead it looked to be about 300 feet off the ground. it was off white in color appearing to be illuminated by a yellowish light coming from within it. it was as big or bigger than a house and was completely silent. it was boxy shaped with multiple angles kind of like on a stealth airplane, it looked like it had darkened square windows in parts of it. it was flat on the bottom with round orange and red randomly flashing lights all around the bottom edge. the lights were round with a dark center (like donuts)they were the size of stop signs. as it continued moving away it was heading s.W. and then slightly turning south it seemed to be going approximately 100+ mph. it suddenly turned off its lights, all of them went off like they were quickly dimmed and not just cut off. two lights on the back, one orange and one red stayed on slightly longer than the others (about 0.5 seconds) these lights seemed to have a burnt look to the dark centers as if maybe exhaust or flames had at one time come out of there. it then started to descend sharply as if it were going to land (or crash) somewhere nearby. it stayed perfectly level as it descended behind the trees on the horizon, it seemed to form a light mist or fog around it as it descended. i noticed that along it's flight path every dog was going crazy, barking and howling.

 me, my wife, and the guy that flagged us down, got into my jeep and drove in the direction we thought it may have gone. we were using a spotlight that plugs into the cigarette lighter to search the fields next to the roads. after driving about a mile, the spotlight suddenly went very dim and the seat belt warning beeper started sounding repeatedly and quickly, also the jeep's automatic transmission would not change gears, when i tried to go into reverse it would not go into gear without a struggle. all of this continued for about 5 minutes and then suddenly everything went back to normal(it is a newer model jeep wrangler and has never done anything like this before). at this point i wondered what we would really do if we found anything. i began to feel a little fearful. we continued searching nearby roads and fields but didn't find anything unusual. on our way back home, as we passed the same location as before, our spotlight again dimmed and the beeping alarms in the jeep began again. we looked around the immediate area but didn't see anything. again this lasted for about 5 minutes. shortly after, we turned around and passed this spot a third time, but this time nothing happened. we finally gave up our search and went home, by then the spotlight was working at full power the jeep was working properly and nothing else occurred..
the man that flagged us down turned out to be a neighbor who lives about a block away. he is a retired commercial airline pilot from england. he said he had never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Large craft came form n.E. flew straight over head and proceeded s.W. then decended rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th 2014 in michigan, at around 9:00 p.M., went out to back yard to watch county fireworks from about 4 miles away. around the end of the show at about 10:15 p.M. i noticed 3 stationary objects in the sky west of where the fireworks were taking place. they appeared about the size of a pea. i thought they were some kind of airplanes or helicopters until i noticed that they just hung there in the sky for quite some time not moving at all. these objects were lined up in a straight line (north to south) and appeared equidistant from each other. around 10:30 pm the farthest north object started to leave going north probably about 3 or 4 miles then turned west and disappeared. the other two objects remained stationary for a short time then started to move. the middle object headed west and disappeared,the south object left in a south-east direction coming around almost directly to my south side and about 3 miles away. this object hovered stationary for about 4 minutes before returning to the original position. the middle object then returned to it's original position and the north object returned as well. they were lined up just as at the beginning. next, the south object moved over to the middle object and just above it so they appeared to be stacked on top of each other. by this time i realized that this is not typical behavior of airplanes. i then ran back into the house, grabbed my camera and back out to the adjoining park next to my house to get pictures. the objects were now starting to make a number of movements back and forth, out and back and i tried my best to get stable photos. what really seemed weird was that when i would get the objects in the frame on my camera, they would simply disappear out of sight. i took several photos with the same result. have never had that happen before with anything. the objects then started to leave going up and off in different directions. as the middle object rose straight up i managed to get it in the screen of my camera and did get a picture, the only one as they all left. this was about 10:50 pm.
i went directly inside and downloaded the pictures to my computer. the first few pictures were just pictures of the dark sky and stars, no objects at all but then i noticed one had a small reddish object in the middle, sure enough i managed to capture at least one picture of the objects which i posted here.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Just prior to fire works ending. spotted 3 objects in western sky. some distance away. ran and got camera. was able to photograph one of the objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I am from india.I am very much interested in extra terrestrial living things and i always belived that they exist may be around us.Me too had an experince but actually dont know whether it is related to it,yesterday while i was watching ufo hunters:alien contact which has been telecasted in history channel.I have been watching in youtube in that there is one scene in which they show a book in which a lady can speak a marselian language that is the language that she claming speaking in mars,and as they shown the letter i was terriffied as the letter or words resembles to the message which i have gotten 9-10years before.One day i was sleeping and as i got up i have seen a message which 9i cant underdstand what it was written and i was more shocked when i have seen the date it was from 2027,i thought may be the setting in my phone was incorrect i have send message to that mobile from my alternate number but when i received that message it was showing correctly and the date was also correct and i have tried to forward the message which i was gotten to other number but as i forward the message,the other mobile to which i fwd the message was showing blank,so that means i cant resend that message,i thought may be it was some error ,until yesterday when i shown that marselian language it was exactly same as which i gotten a 10years before from 2027 i dont remember the date and month as i was just 12-13 years at that time and after sometime my brother deleted that message he was too young that he have not noticied the date on it,and after some years i have started to got the nightmare while sleeping i was sleeping i am going to state where my barin sleeps and my mind i wake where i am seeing the things around me but i cant move,and suddenly i am seeing someone trying to say something to me,i one insident i have seen that one man or may be someother thing actually face was not visible it was full black and height of around 5.4 ft,he was shooting a bullet at me as bullet was approching my head i suddenly wake up or able to move myself as i was not sleeping my brain was sleeping and my mind was wake,these thing continue to happen to me for 3-5 years,now it was not happening to me,but as iseen the episodes yesterday i thoght i too had somewhat similar to it,in that too man had been seeing a nightmare in which he sleeps but his mind is awake.
  i dont know whether it is related to alien or extra terrestrial but i have  doubt  related to the message i gotten and the marselian language which i have seen yesterday..
content.summary: I have not seen the ufo but i had some exoerience which i have shared below

content.detailedDescription:
At about 5:29 p.M. pacific time on tuesday, june17, 20014, i walked out my gate to look across open fields of tomatoes looking across another 12 miles of oak and crops or dry scrub toward the slightly hazy mountains on the west of the big, central valley. so, i was looking due west and just slightly north of the canyon entry to lake berryessa. it was clear and sunny outside. looking due west at about 1500-3000 feet and 1 1/2 to 3 miles from me i saw a large, brightly reflected metal face, seemingly wedge-shaped in stationary, possibly hovering mode (not making sound), which, after about 1 second, disappeared. then it appeared again, this time in more or less the same place. it was clearly a large, roughly 35-60 foot metal canopy and it shifted position so suddenly that it could not be a normal curved aerodynamic maneuver. after another 2 or three seconds, it appeared again, this time with crisp, clean definition. it was a smoothly domed, shiny metallic saucer that had a dark metallic (blackish or dark bluish) apron around its lower rim. i noticed a kind of fast, very elastic distortion of the air and light at the edges of the disk, a field effect as it hovered with a slightly wobbly center of gravity. after 2-3 seconds in plain view, it suddenly folded into a kind of space and, after a couple of seconds, appeared about 2-4 kilometers to the southeast and farther away. then, after a few seconds, it appeared about a kilometer closer (still to my west-southwest) it hovered, again making no sounds, then began to shift position, then appeared to possibly be joined by another. i essentially felt a communication asking me if i would want it shot down, which i certainly didn���t. but then i pulled back to a merely observational, studious mind-frame. unlike some people, i don���t welcome incursions by what appear to be so-called ���gray���-related aliens. instead, i am on highly active, expanded watch for if and when such cases arise. as a citizen, i don���t want aliens to enter and operate at will in our atmosphere.

 i followed the disk as it began to move in a northwesterly direction, moving at about half a mile to a mile per second, following the line of the mountains as they grow gradually taller ��� out along the range, looking north-northwest along the big valley���s western rim. the disk hover flew, causing a kind of flickering of its outlines as it moved. in order to see where it went, i followed north along a dirt road for 80 yards in order to not lose sight of it. then it was joined by first one, then two and then, finally, four other domed objects, each featuring a kind of oscillatory, linear creasing of (gravitic) space just beneath them. they hovered, clearly aware of each other���s positions, then one began to swoop down toward the ground suddenly, faster than any aerodynamic form could without fatal injury, then they all faded out and were gone.
content.summary: Flying disk over fields west of davis ca

content.detailedDescription:
On july 5 at 11:45 p.M., i was with my dogs in the backyard during their potty break.  i enjoy stargazing & frequently look up while outside at night (my back door faces east) and since the moon is only 1/2 full and low on the western horizon, it was dark in the yard & great for sky watching.
moving southeast to northeast in a straight line i was surprised to see what appeared to be a red rectangular shaped object with a bright white light in the middle (diffused light-didn't have specific edges).  the shape was something like a parachute a sport skydiver might use, except this rectangular object was moving lengthwise and steadily straight-line.  i know it wasn't a helicopter (saw & heard the police chopper flying earlier before & after the fireworks show), it didn't look like a plane and i never heard any sounds.  i moved to the front yard to keep it in view and saw my neighbor (retired military, worked on helicopters) so i called him over to look at it.  he was as surprised and puzzled as i was as he didn't hear anything and saw the same rectangular shape as it was moving away from us.  the object eventually grew dim, similar to an ember extinguishing, although we could barely make out a "shape" still moving away in the same straight-line until it disappeared from sight behind a tree line in the distance.  the entire episode lasted about 2 minutes. i've seen the iss before & this object was larger/lower in the sky and i could make out a shape vs. the iss's large all white light image-and the iss wasn't scheduled for a fly-over at that time.  this really freaked me out as i've never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Red/orange rectangle with bright white light in center, no noise or trail, straight-line path se to ne

content.detailedDescription: My son and myself were out for a walk on this bike path when out of nowhere three super large and bright lights lit up one st a time, after aprox 8 minutes this craft ill call it two larger lights began shooting out 40-50 aprox lights the same weird color but much smaller out and they zipped off in diff directions, the lights were as best as we can describe as living in a way. tbey were mostly red with orange/yellow swirling within the red. we could plainly see within the three lights that it was a solid object we tried to see it on my camera phone but it didnt show up on it. after the smaller ejected lights wefe gone. about two minutes later these latger lights went out one at a time. i really dont care who believes us, i always remained sceptical about this stuff, and now my son and myself look up always, i wonder why, how, and  why, but mostly how many are there and how much larger they can get. the size was very disturbing. ive lost many friends since by telling them, but if they were true friends they should have believed me. please help us better understand this event, mostly what those smaller objects were if they wernt ships then what were they? please keep me unamous to everyone. we know what we saw was real there isnt anything here we saw that had a second possibilty, it was massive.Thank you and please email us back on more ideas of exactly what this was. it was n nw from us.From my cjrrent address
content.summary: Three large red/orange lights, ejected 40-50 small but same lights, around 1.5-2 mile diaeter

content.detailedDescription: Ultimately the same as the short description above, except that the vessel appeared to have a window in which a pinkish light was coming from, which made me question whether the object was a remote controlled vessel. it appeared to be a little larger than a basketball, and was low enough that i thought i may hit it.
content.summary: Was driving home on highway and saw a light to the west about 10 yards ahead and about the height of a semi-truck and it went across the highway to the east and disappeared behind the trees

content.detailedDescription: Franklin,indiana.On south side of house,sitting out side with my daughter grand children.There ages are2 and 4. we seen this the nightbbefore.The orangy object flyingin the sky.We didnt know what the objects are.Unknown.The actions of objects were orange light flying inthe air south to north.There were3.They flew one at a time.The last object i was running in front yard trying to film it with my cell phone,i didnt turn video camara on.The last object turned lights off,it was black and looked like a bat when its flying.Then disapeared.I was frightened when i seen it black.We didnt know what the objects were.The first 2 north,the last one disapeared.I think they know when your looking at them.
content.summary: I seen 3 unknown object,flew by one by.Orangy lights .The last one i seen turned lights off looked black and shaped like a bat flying.Then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was arriving home late when i took out my garbage. in the n. east sky appeared a bright star like object  below commercial planes but high enough to dismiss any features. moved to the s. east slow. too slow to produce lift on a winged plane. no noise was heard and the light seamed to be non conventional like it was almost made of light. while the ufo was directly over head i noticed and heard a police helicopter south heading in the line of the ufo as to intercept. when the object reached near intercepting helocopter it simple faded out. gone!
content.summary: Extremely brighter then any star the ufo moved without care. police helicopter observed then the ufo simply vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was in franklin,indiana.In my back yard.Taking dogs out.Seen orange firey lights flying from south to north.I had no idea what object was.The object wasflying fast through the sky total of 4,flew by one at a time a couple of minuts apart.Had time to go get binaculars,my husband looked through the binaculars the object stope for a few seconds,lights dimmed and it disapeared.During the sighting we wanted to know what we were seeing.After sightings we felt confused on what we just seen.Lost sight of them they flew north,the last one disapeared.
content.summary: See objects in the sky,i dont what object was

content.detailedDescription: We could not see this lights as we took the picture,,my father in law took the pictures on his iphone on rapid picture mode,he wanted to see the indian place found on the hiway and take pictures and this is wat happen
content.summary: We where driving to vegas for vacation

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:45 we were on house back deck.  i looked up to see a redish/white egg/ball shaped object.  lower than cloud cover. absolutely silent moving northeast towards lake ontario.  it had pulsation but not intense.

when looking (for example) at a bright star or light one witnesses the light extending from the star.  this object had red "arms" (if you will) of such light extending a significant distance from the main object, perhaps one and a half times the objects visible size.

i could not tell the objects true size or height due to no references to judge it by in the sky. it was certainly significant in size,  i have never saw anything like it before and it was completely silent.

the object was witnessed by four of us.

about 15 minutes later i observed a white light blinking headed the same direction above broken cloud cover at a high altitude and could hear the jet and it was moving fast.
content.summary: Red/white ball/egg shaped flew right over head silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was sat on my bed when i noticed a flickering light through my blinds. i opened my window for a clearer look and what i saw shook me. it appeared to be a silver hovering diamond emitting purple and  blue lights. the lights were blinking vigorously  and continuously.  i then noticed how this flickering craft which also had three bright white lights in a triangular formation seemed to slowly drift and ascend towards the left side of my view. accompanied with this was an extreme feeling of fear, unease and paranoia. i felt an impending sense of doom, it was horrible. after around 30 minutes it disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a hovering diamond that had flickering lights and moved easily and silently.

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out @ 11:00 pm as i always do, looking to the north i could see 2 bright search light type beams going up (like you would see at a grand opening), one towards the north and one towards the east, eventually both lights became aimed in the same eastern direction. since i live in the country and there is nothing that direction or miles but homes and farmland i thought i would drive that direction and have a look. i got in my car and started driving towards them when i looked up the lights were gone. in the distance taking up what looked like both lanes of the road were red flashing lights. i assumed that there was an accident and that the lights were that of paramedics and police, i continued on to check it out. the road is hilly and i lost site of the lights over the hills, as i came to the area where the lights should have been, they were gone. then i noticed a red light maneuvering through the sky heading north slowly, all of the sudden i took of fast. when i got back home i noticed the clock in my car was an hour off and my tv satellite hard drive had crashed beyond repair. they next day i asked my neighbor if he had seen anything the night before and he said yes, 2 black helicopters with search lights. i called the local police and county sheriff's department, they said that they hadn't had any strange reports or accidents. i called wright-patterson and they told me to call dayton international airport and have them check their radar, so far i have not heard back from them.
content.summary: I seen an object in the road  rt56...The 28th at about 11:00 in the evening...Covered both lanes of a two lane main north & south road.I

content.detailedDescription: The red orange orb like objects people have been seeing came over my house my 2 renters outside smoking a cig and around 10 maybe more of them then came and got me i sat outside hoping to see and within 2 min 1 last one flew by as it was almost over my house it broke into two pieces i dont know why but a fireball came falling down 4 houses down it was 1am so i stomped it out and have it the other part took off back in the direction it came from did not end up following the path of the rest. i have this piece of what only looks like some sort of insulation but must be very high temp insulation because it barely looks burned but it was on fire like a fire ball all the down to ground til i stomped it out, iwasnt sure what to do til someone at work i told the story to said there has been several witnesses to the same thing i saw so i figure maybe i have something maybe it was sent down to observe but had some sort of malfuntion and went back to where it came from. the part that stayed in the sky was now like a star moving much quicker then before it broke, get back to me ill be happy to give a sample of what fell.By the way i was forced to put that it happened no sooner then todays date for some reason but it happened around june 28 2014
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orange orb like objects
